attributes.additional_details: Improve motorway services for truckers but for everyone in general we are the backbone of the UK and get treated like rats
attributes.background:
Improve motorway services !
make them adequate for truckers.Fix the potholes.
Make them affordable for truckers.
Improve on the size as most are very small.
Improve showers toilets ect they are disgusting.Truckers are the backbone for the UK economy and we get treated like rats 
Sort them out.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The Department for Transport regulates motorway service areas, but the maintenance of these and provision of services are a matter for private operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.
